item.title: Bazaar Logic
item.description: Bibi had barely finished speaking before the criticism came rolling in:

item.title: Blue-and-Whitewashing: Using Jews to cover up Anti-Semitism
item.description: If you're the type of person who is reading this blog (you poor unfortunate soul), chances are you've heard of the term "Jew-washing." This term - coined by Yitzak Santis and Gerald M. Steinberg of NGO Monitor in their article On ‘Jew-Washing’ And BDS: How Jewish anti-Israel activists are gaining influence among Christian groups. - is the pro-Israel attempt to fight fire with fire.

item.title: About the Palestinian "Refugees"
item.description: Should Israel let them "come back?"(hint: It already has!)

item.title: Welcome to Jekyll!
item.description: You'll find this post in your _posts directory - edit this post and re-build (or run with the -w switch) to see your changes! To add new posts, simply add a file in the _posts directory that follows the convention: YYYY-MM-DD-name-of-post.ext.
